about_the_game:
What is this game ?

"death Finder" is horror game made by individual and powered by Unreal Engine 5.

How to Play?

you find yourself outside an old abandon hospital have to look five files of five different people but it is not that easy as there are unpredictable horrors lurk around every corner. you lose when monsters caught you or big giant spiders and when win collected all the five folders and got to the exit door, various jump scares. you also have a door that is locked by a key which you will find in Harp's Office. another door which is locked by a lever in the basement which is allocated in the room before the locked door room. And last door which is locked by password and the password are allocated inside the building next to doors and are 4 numbers (Pay attention to all the details). once you start press F for the flash light as the main theme is darkness, and start looking for the folders, restart when caught by spiders/monster and start again

What Can you get in the game ?:

  • Monsters/Spiders
  • Jump scares
  • Missions like collecting folders to win the game at the end
  • Some puzzles

content_descriptors.notes: The game is 18+ and contain General Mature Content, Violence, and Gore.

name: Death Finder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5-9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1070 / RX 5600 XT 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone - Headset and SSD Highly Recommended !!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X／Intel Core i5-12600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 12 GB / RX 6700 XT 12GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone - Headset and SSD Highly Recommended !!

short_description: horror experience, with puzzles to be solved and collecting files to win avoiding monsters and big giant spiders. Walk slow, pay attention to details and read all papers when see. Stay away from monsters and Spiders or risk becoming another victim of the abandon hospital
